knimeNode.name: OMERO Labeling Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads all the ROIs of an image from an OMERO Server and converts them into a Labeling

fullDescription.intro: This node allows you to read the ROIs attached to an image from an OMERO Server as a labeling.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The ImageID of the image from which the attached ROIs will be read.

ports.inPort: Connection information for an OMERO server (from OMERO Connection node).
ports.outPort: The ROIs read from the OMERO Server.
